description.en:
event fired when button Apply in column chooser is clicked
The handler function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridHiding widget.
Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget.
Use ui.columnChooserElement to get a reference to the Column Chooser element. This is a jQuery object.
Use ui.columnsToShow to get array of columns identifiers which should be shown
Use ui.columnsToHide to get array of columns identifiers which should be hidden

description.en:
event fired every time the column chooser changes its position.
The handler function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridHiding widget.
Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget.
Use ui.columnChooserElement to get a reference to the Column Chooser element. This is a jQuery object.
Use ui.originalPosition to get the original position of the column chooser div as { top, left } object, relative to the page.
Use ui.position to get the current position of the column chooser div as { top, left } object, relative to the page.

description.en:
event fired after the hiding has been executed and results are rendered.
The handler function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridHiding widget.
Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget.
Use ui.columnIndex to get the hidden column index. Has a value only if the column's key is a number.
Use ui.columnKey to get the hidden column key. Has a value only if the column's key is a string.

description.en: Specifies time of milliseconds for animation duration to show/hide modal dialog
description.jp: Specifies time of milliseconds for animation duration to show/hide modal dialog

description.en: Specifies text of button which apply changes in modal dialog
description.jp: Specifies text of button which apply changes in modal dialog

description.en: Specifies text of button which cancel changes in modal dialog
description.jp: Specifies text of button which cancel changes in modal dialog

description.en: The caption of the column chooser dialog.
description.jp: The caption of the column chooser dialog.

description.en:
Controls containment behavior.
owner The column chooser dialog will be draggable only in the grid area
window The column chooser dialog will be draggable in the whole window area
description.jp:
Controls containment behavior.
owner The column chooser dialog will be draggable only in the grid area
window The column chooser dialog will be draggable in the whole window area

description.en: The column chooser dialog will be draggable only in the grid area
description.jp: The column chooser dialog will be draggable only in the grid area

description.en: The column chooser dialog will be draggable in the whole window area
description.jp: The column chooser dialog will be draggable in the whole window area

description.en: The text used in the drop down tools menu(Feature Chooser) to launch the column chooser dialog.
description.jp: The text used in the drop down tools menu(Feature Chooser) to launch the column chooser dialog.

description.en: The default column chooser height in pixels.
description.jp: The default column chooser height in pixels.

description.en: Specifies on click show/hide directly to be shown/hidden columns. If columnChooserHideOnClick is false then Apply and Cancel Buttons are shown on the bottom of modal dialog. Columns are Shown/Hidden after the Apply button is clicked
description.jp: Specifies on click show/hide directly to be shown/hidden columns. If columnChooserHideOnClick is false then Apply and Cancel Buttons are shown on the bottom of modal dialog. Columns are Shown/Hidden after the Apply button is clicked

description.en: The text used in the column chooser to hide column
description.jp: The text used in the column chooser to hide column

description.en: Text label for reset button.
description.jp: Text label for reset button.

description.en: The text used in the column chooser to show column
description.jp: The text used in the column chooser to show column

description.en: The default column chooser width in pixels.
description.jp: The default column chooser width in pixels.

description.en: The text used in the drop down tools menu(Feature Chooser) to hide a column.
description.jp: The text used in the drop down tools menu(Feature Chooser) to hide a column.

description.en: A list of column settings that specifies hiding options on a per column basis.
description.jp: A list of column settings that specifies hiding options on a per column basis.

description.en: Specifies the column key of the hidden column
description.jp: Specifies the column key of the hidden column

description.en: Column index can be used in place of column key. The preferred way of populating a column setting is to always use the column keys as identifiers.
description.jp: Column index can be used in place of column key. The preferred way of populating a column setting is to always use the column keys as identifiers.

description.en: Allows the column to be hidden.
description.jp: Allows the column to be hidden.

description.en: Sets the initial visibility of the column.
description.jp: Sets the initial visibility of the column.

description.en: The duration of the dropdown animation in milliseconds.
description.jp: The duration of the dropdown animation in milliseconds.

description.en: The width in pixels of the hidden column indicator in the header.
description.jp: The width in pixels of the hidden column indicator in the header.

description.en: The text displayed in the tooltip of the hidden column indicator.
description.jp: The text displayed in the tooltip of the hidden column indicator.
